item.title: Waves Intersecting at Right Angles and a Folded Paper
item.description: Perpendicular Intersecting Waves (page 119, Problem 24) Problem Solution A Folded Paper (page 130, Problem 30) Problem Solution: Minimum Area library(knitr) library(tidyverse) library(ggthemes) opts_chunk$set( fig.align = "center", message = FALSE, warning = FALSE ) I found these two problems in Simmons (2016). I enjoyed these problems because they require more thinking than just a mechanical application of derivatives. Perpendicular Intersecting Waves (page 119, Problem 24) Problem Find \(a > 0\) so that the curves \(y = \sin {ax}\) and \(y=\cos {ax}\) intersect at right angles.
